overview: The writing/directing debut of City Lights/PM Entertainment co-founder Joseph Merhi, this semi-autobiographical screwball comedy follows the adventures of a Hollywood dreamer who, despite having zero experience in the film industry, attempts to take the town by storm, only to send his entire domestic life into a tailspin.
tagline: When you are fed up with seeing bad movies...itâ€™s time to make your own!
title: Hollywood In Trouble
